name: Stir Fried Beef in Oyster Sauce with Mushrooms
recipeIngredient: 400 g rump beef steak (very thinly sliced),
recipeInstructions: 1. Mix the beef with the cornflour, fish sauce, and dark soy sauce. Leave to marinate for 10 minutes.
2. Heat the oil in the wok and  stir fry the beef and garlic for 1 1/2 minutes.
3. Add half of the oyster sauce and a few tbsp of water, along with the sugar, mushrooms, chilli, and spring onion (reserving some of the greens).
4. Stir fry until the mushrooms are tender and the meat is cooked (about 1 1/2 minutes).
5. Pour in the remaining oyster sauce then check seasoning adding extra sugar if necessary.
6. Garnish with reserved spring onion greens to serve.
